Artisan.text:
Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5 BP.
Put a card from you hand onto your deck.

Bandit.text: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

Bureaucrat.text: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory Cards).

Cellar.text:
+1 Action
Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.

Chapel.text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

Council_Room.text:
+4 Cards
+1 Buy
Each player draws a card.

Gardens.text: Worth 1 VP per 10 cards you have (round down)

Harbinger.text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

Library.text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those asice, discarding them afterwards.

Merchant.text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
The first time you play a Silver this turn, +1 BP.

Militia.text:
+2 BP
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Mine.text: You may trash a Treasure from you hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3 BP more than it.

Moat.text:
+2 Cards
When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.

Moneylender.text: You may trash a Copper from you hand for +3 BP.

Poacher.text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+1 BP
Discard a card per empty Supply Pile.

Remodel.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 BP more than it.

Sentry.text:
+1 Card
+1Action
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Throne_Room.text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.

Vassal.text:
+2 BP
Discard the top card of your deck. If it's and Action card, you may play it.

Witch.text:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Curse.

Workshop.text: Gain a card costing up to 4 BP.

Adventurer.text: Reveal cards from you deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

Chancellor.text:
+2 BP
You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

Feast.text: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 BP.

Spy.text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of their deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

Thief.text: Each other player reveals the the top 2 cards of their deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose, You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.
